text: Jean-Michel Sama Lukonde Kyenge (born 1978) is a Congolese politician. He has been the Prime Minister of the Democratic Republic of the Congo from 15 February 2021 until 12 June 2024. He came into office the day of the tragic 2021 Congo River disaster. He was named Prime Minister by President FÃ©lix Tshisekedi in February 2021. On August 12, 2024, Sama Lukonde Kyenge was elected president of the senate, with 84 votes out of 96. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1978 births Category:Prime ministers of the Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: Jean-Michel Sama Lukonde
